摰字的基本解释

摰
niè
不坚固。

摰
chè
古同“掣”，拽；拉。

摰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niè］
［《集韻》倪結切，入屑，疑。］
危，不坚固。
[②]［chè］
［《集韻》尺制切，去祭，昌。］
引，曳。

摰字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　摰； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页451第19
【集韻】【韻會】?倪結切，音齧。危不安也。與隉臲同。　又【集韻】【正韻】?魚列切，音孽。義同。【周禮·冬官考工記·輪人】轂小而長則柞，大而短則摰。【註】摰讀爲槷。謂輻危摰也。　又【集韻】尺制切，同掣。見掣字註。【六書正譌】曳挽也。从手埶聲。埶古蓺字。借爲尺列切，危也。　本作?。與摯別。

摰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
摰字的起名意思

暂无。

摰
Basic explanation of words
摰
niè
Not sturdy.
摰
chè
Gu Tong "pull", pull; pull.
摰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niè］
["Ji Yun" Ni Jieqie, into the crumbs, doubt. ]
Dangerous, not strong.
[②]［chè］
["Jiyun" ruler cutting, go to sacrifice, Chang. ]
Lead, troll.
摰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　摰; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 451 19
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Ni Jieqie, sound bite. Uneasy also. Same as Zou Zang.　[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Fish list cut, sound evil. The same meaning. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji·Lun Ren】The hub is small and long is tussah, and big and short is truss. [Note] Read as 槷. It is also dangerous.　[Jiyun] The ruler is cut, the same is the same. See the note to the key word. [Liu Shu Zheng Jiao] Drag and pull. From the sound of the hand.埶古蓺字. Borrowed as Chilieche, danger is also.　This work?. Goodbye.
